title: february 26: the communist manifesto
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the writing and release of The Communist Manifesto by Karl Marx and Friedrich Engels. Afterwards, she talks about the debut album of one of the smoothest jazz artists of the early 2000s. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
